column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I came here for brunch on Sunday (and maybe that was my mistake)
column2: but I didn't think the food was that spectacular.  The service was okay
column3: but they were kind of slow and not very friendly or engaging.  We had the sausage-fried paella rice with poached egg
column6: and grilled octopus.  Nothing special to write home about.
